text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump That's great, but where are the tests? Nationwide, fewer and fewer people are being tested. Without tests, Covid-19 will go on and 
on until January when Biden takes over. Then we can begin acting intelligently in dealing with this virus.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
